pastasites.name: Pasta Salad
pastasites.description: Pasta salad (Pasta fredda) is a salad dish prepared with one or more types of pasta, almost always chilled, and most often tossed in a vinegar, oil, or mayonnaise-based dressing. It is typically served as an appetizer, side dish or a main course.

pastasites.name: Spaghetti with Meatballs
pastasites.description: Spaghetti is the most popular shape in Italy. The name comes from the Italian word spaghi, which means length of cord.

pastasites.name: Linguine
pastasites.description: Linguine is a type of pasta similar to fettuccine and tremette but elliptical in section rather than flat.

pastasites.name: Stuffed Shells
pastasites.description: Stuffed shells are made with conchiglioni pasta, the larger version of conchiglie, which means 'conch shells. They're usually stuffed with a combination of meat, cheesess and vegetables'.

pastasites.name: Lasagna
pastasites.description: Lasagna is a baked Italian dish consisting of wide strips cooked and layered with meat, vegetables, chese and tomato sauce

reviews.text: The Best Italian Pasta Salad Recipe: Made with fresh ingredients and bursting with flavor, this is the most perfect cold  pasta salad!
This is a great pasta salad because it has things that just about everyone likes..
Excellent! This was a big hit and the entire family loved it.
This had promise, and next time I'll use more dressing and  add cheese.
This a favorite summertime recipe that I love to take to picnics!
I wanted to make spaghetti and meatballs forever but I was too scard that it might fall aplart. This was great and easy to make recipe my kids loved it.
This was delicious! I added some mushrooms and black olives to the sauce. I will definitely make it again!
Easy recipe and easily followed, I added an extra cube into the sauce to my liking. clean pates all around and extra in the freezer for another time.
This looks so richi and delicious!
This wwas soo good! I followed your tips for cooking the pasta and mariana sauce, made a whole difference!
This linguine looks divine and very yummy!
So simple to make and fast. Perfect for those days when you are either in a hurry or just don't feel like a super heavy meal.Love it..
We love shrimp and pasta at oour house. This recipe looks amazing!
I highly recommend this dish to anyone who loves shrimp and wants something really easy to make
OH MY GOSH I can NOT say enough about this dish!! It was AWESOME and soo easy!
Such a great recipe! Stuffed shells are a familly favorite for sure!.
These Italian stuffed shells are the ultimate creamy, cheesy baked pasta dish!
This is my new go to dinner when I'm looking for comfort food!
Absolutely fantastic! Stuffed the shells with ground beef.
Talk about delicious pasta dinner!
Great, easy and fast meal!
I served this to my family and they absolutely love it.
Absolutely delicious and incredibly easy to make!
I tried this recipe for dinner this evening. It was DELICIOUS, I used half Ricotta cheese and cottage cheese in this recipe.
What's better than an authentic stuffed shell! NOTHING! YUM!.

sides.name: Garlic Bread
sides.description: bread toasted and flavored with butter and garlic.

sides.description: Join Git Out Expeditions to explore new horizons with a group of other adventurers!

sides.name: Sauces
sides.description: There are different type of pasta sauces. The most popular ones are: Marinara, Alfredo and Bolognese pasta sauce

sides.name: Cheese
sides.description: There are several different cheeses that pair well with pasta dishes. Parmesan is the first that comes to mind of course, but also Romano, Mozzarella, Fontina or Ricotta are some favorites..
